channel.title: J-RISE NEWS
channel.description: J-RISE Initiative公式のニュースフィード

item.title: Minister of State for Science and Technology Policy, KIUCHI Minoru, visited Tohoku University and exchanged opinions with researchers.
Minister of State for Science and Technology Policy, KIUCHI Minoru, visited RIKEN and exchanged opinions with researchers.
Call for FY 2025 application of the FOREST (Fusion Oriented REsearch for disruptive Science and Technology) program is now open.
